channel.title: +1 Forward - PbtA in the Time of Social Distancing
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/pbta-in-the-time-of-social-distancing
**Timecodes:** 00:13:36 - Duet Gaming with a local partner or roommate 00:20:09 - Things to consider with PbtA Games to run them as a Duet Game 00:32:25 - Gaming at home (with kids) 00:38:05 - Gaming Online with video conference tools 00:51:02 - RPG Play-by-Post (on forum or the like) 00:56:04 - RP by Chat (irc, Discord, or Slack)

item.title: +1 Forward - PbtA in the Time of Social Distancing
item.dc:creator: @dunadhaigh
item.description:
@dunadhaigh wrote:

Would anyone be interested in trying this format out?

Read full topic
item.source: +1 Forward - PbtA in the Time of Social Distancing

item.title: +1 Forward - PbtA in the Time of Social Distancing
item.dc:creator: @Alexi_Sarge
item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Fun episode! You brought up duet PbtA games. We wrote 2 of those for #YourMoveJam. Bring Home the Babe is about older siblings bargaining to get their baby sibling back from the fey. The Tabula Initiative is about amnesiac spies outrunning their pasts.

Read full topic
item.source: +1 Forward - PbtA in the Time of Social Distancing

item.title: +1 Forward - PbtA in the Time of Social Distancing
item.dc:creator: @dunadhaigh
item.description:
@dunadhaigh wrote:

I’m currently really interested in trying out play-by-video-message with the Marco Polo app. It seems like it could be an interesting middle ground between videoconferencing and pbp.

Read full topic
item.source: +1 Forward - PbtA in the Time of Social Distancing
